video widget: The label for the video widget.
Side video: The label for the Side video option.
Full size video: The label for the Full size video option.
Left aligned video: The label for the Left aligned video option.
Centered video: The label for the Centered video option.
Right aligned video: The label for the Right aligned video option.
Upload failed: The title of the notification displayed when upload fails.
Video toolbar: The label used by assistive technologies describing an video toolbar attached to an video widget.
Resize video: The label used for the dropdown in the video toolbar containing defined resize options.
Resize video to %0: The label used for the standalone resize options buttons in the video toolbar.
Resize video to the original size: The accessibility label of the standalone video resize reset option button in the video toolbar for screen readers.
Original: The default label for the resize option that resets the size of the video.
Video resize list: The accessibility label of the video resize dropdown for screen readers.
Insert: The label of the form submit button if the video source URL input has no value.
Update: The label of the form submit button if the video source URL input has a value.
Insert video via URL: The input label for the Insert video via URL form.
Update video URL: The input label for the Insert video via URL form for a pre-existing video.
The content of the tip below the Insert video via URL form.
